name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI Humanizer and Detector by Rephrasy

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Best AI Humanizer and Detector. 100 % undetectable for AI Detectors.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Verify what content was written by a human or an AI chatbot with the Rephrasy browser extension for AI content detection and humanization.

We explain how to use the Chrome Extension in under 10 steps in this blogpost:
https://www.rephrasy.ai/blog/chrome-extension-to-humanize-ai-text

With the Detector, you can quickly and accurately determine what was written by a human and what was AI-generated. Additionally, our Humanization feature allows you to transform AI-generated text to appear human-like, ensuring a natural and authentic writing style. You'll bypass every major AI Detector like Copyleaks and so on.

➤ AI Detector Key Features:
Over 90% accuracy and a very low false positive rate.
Detect ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude, and more.
Detect AI text even if it was paraphrased by low-quality AI Rephrasers (our's won't ever be detected) or interspersed with human-written content.

➤ Humanization Feature
Transform AI-generated text to appear human-like with our Humanization feature. This ensures a natural and authentic writing style, making it impossible to distinguish between human-written and AI-generated content. Be undetectable for AI Detectors.

➤ Using the Rephrasy.ai Extension is easy, and installation takes mere seconds:
✅ Download and activate the extension.
✅ Click on the icon to open the API key settings. (You need an API key from Rephrasy.ai.)
✅ Add the API key and you're ready to go.
✅ Go to any website, right-click, and select "Rephrasy: Analyze selected text" to get started.

➤ Enjoying the Rephrasy.ai Detector? Please rate us!
